Date.description: The date of the recorded cryptocurrency data.

Open.description: The opening price of the cryptocurrency at the start of the trading day (likely in USD).

High.description: The highest price of the cryptocurrency during the trading day (likely in USD).

Low.description: The lowest price of the cryptocurrency during the trading day (likely in USD).

Close.description: The closing price of the cryptocurrency at the end of the trading day (likely in USD).

Adj Close.description: The adjusted closing price of the cryptocurrency at the end of the trading day. This price accounts for any corporate actions that might have occurred (likely in USD).

Volume.description: The number of shares or contracts traded in the cryptocurrency during the trading day.
